00018 void Obstacle_manager::Remove_obstacle(Obstacle* obstacle)
00019 {
00020         mon_assert(obstacle);
00021         obstacles.erase(std::find(obstacles.begin(), obstacles.end(), obstacle));
00022 }

00027 bool Obstacle_manager::Line_collision(const Vector& line_begin, const Vector& line_end, Collision_data& data)
00028 {
00029         for(Obstacles::iterator i = obstacles.begin(); i != obstacles.end(); ++i)
00030         {
00031                 if((*i)->Line_collision(line_begin, line_end, data))
00032                 {
00033                         return true;
00034                 }
00035         }
00036         return false;
00037 }

00040 //Todo: replace return data with adjust vector and obstacles hit?
00041 //Collision with self bug
00042 bool Obstacle_manager::Circle_collision(const Vector& center, float radius, Collision_data& data, Obstacle* self)
00043 {
00044         Collision_datas collision_datas;
00045         Collision_data temp_data;
00046         for(Obstacles::iterator i = obstacles.begin(); i != obstacles.end(); ++i)
00047         {
00048                 if(*i == self)
00049                         continue;
00050                 if((*i)->Circle_collision(center, radius, temp_data))
00051                 {
00052                         //Todo: Not fill in obstacle in the obstacles themselves
00053                         temp_data.obstacle = *i;
00054                         collision_datas.push_back(temp_data);
00055                 }
00056         }
00057 
00058         if (collision_datas.size() > 0)
00059         {
00060                 Vector total_adjust;
00061                 for(Collision_datas::iterator i=collision_datas.begin(); i!=collision_datas.end(); ++i)
00062                 {
00063                         total_adjust+=i->adjust;
00064                 }
00065                 Vector average = total_adjust/collision_datas.size();
00066 
00067                 for(Collision_datas::iterator i=collision_datas.begin(); i!=collision_datas.end(); ++i)
00068                 {
00069                         i->obstacle->Circle_collision(center+average, radius, temp_data);
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 data.adjust = average;
00073 
00074                 return true;
00075         }
00076         return false;
00077 }

00088         }
